title: Participating in IDD self-advocacy group
content:
Scenario: Participating in IDD self-advocacy group
    Given there's a local IDD self-advocacy organization
    And Jordan wants to participate in advocacy work
    When Jordan attends a self-advocacy meeting
    Then the personal_agent provides accessible meeting information
    And the meeting uses IDD-accessible facilitation practices
    And Jordan can share experiences and voice concerns
    And Jordan's advocacy contribution is valued by peers
    And the group works on issues Jordan cares about
    And Jordan accumulates care tokens for community advocacy work
    And Jordan experiences political agency and community power
